methodology.text_1: The calculation of the cooling capacity Q (in kilowatts) is performed according to the following methodology:

item_1.title: — heat gains from windows, walls, floor, and ceiling.
item_1.sub_3: q = 40 for rooms with a lot of sunlight

item_2.title: — the sum of heat gains from people.
item_2.subtitle: Heat gains from an adult:

item_3.title: — the sum of heat gains from household appliances.
item_3.subtitle: Heat gains from household appliances:
item_3.sub_5: For other devices, it can be assumed that they release 30% of their maximum power as heat (i.e., it is assumed that the average power consumption is 30% of the maximum)

methodology.summary_first: The air conditioner's capacity should fall within the
methodology.summary_second: which spans from 5% below to 20% above the calculated capacity

validations.name: Room name is a required field

room_number.type: Room number must be a number
room_number.required: Room number is a required field

system_number.type: System number must be a number
system_number.required: System number is a required field
system_number.positive: System number must be a positive number

ceiling_height.type: Ceiling height must be a number
ceiling_height.required: Ceiling height is a required field
ceiling_height.positive: Ceiling height must be a positive number
ceiling_height.min: The ceiling height cannot be less than 1000 mm.

length.type: Room length must be a number
length.required: Room length is a required field
length.positive: Room length must be a positive number
length.max: Room length must not exceed 100000 mm
length.min: The room length cannot be less than 100 mm.

width.type: Room width must be a number
width.required: Room width is a required field
width.positive: Room width must be a positive number
width.max: Room width must not exceed 100000 mm
width.min: The room width cannot be less than 100 mm.

area.type: Room area must be a number
area.required: Room area is a required field
area.positive: Room area must be a positive number
area.max: Room area must not exceed 1000 m²

validations.physicalActivityType: Physical activity level is a required field

people.type: Number of people must be a number
people.required: Number of people is required for a residential room
people.positive: Number of people must be a positive number
people.max: Number of people must not exceed 20

computers.type: Number of computers must be a number
computers.positive: Number of computers must be a positive number
computers.max: Number of computers must not exceed 10

TVs.type: Number of TVs must be a number
TVs.positive: Number of TVs must be a positive number
TVs.max: Number of TVs must not exceed 10

appliances.type: Power of other appliances must be a number
appliances.positive: Power of other appliances must be a positive number
appliances.max: Power of other appliances must not exceed 20 kW

exchange_rate.type: Exchange rate value must be a number
exchange_rate.positive: Exchange rate value cannot be negative
exchange_rate.max: Exchange rate value must not exceed 20

airflow_rate.type: Airflow rate value must be a number
airflow_rate.positive: Airflow rate value cannot be negative
airflow_rate.max: Airflow rate value must not exceed 150

window_area.type: Window area must be a number
window_area.required: Window area is a required field
window_area.positive: Window area must be a positive number
window_area.max: Window area must not exceed 30 m²
window_area.min: The glazing area must be greater than 2 m² to be considered in the calculation.

validations.power_increase: Power increase is a required field
